Ask HN: Has anyone adopted or seen adoption of RFC8959 secret-token?
text:
Has anyone seen adoption of the 'secret-token:' prefix to help prevent leakage of API secrets as described by RFC8959? Do API users understand its purpose and respond positively or negatively to it?

See also https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc8959.txt and https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=25978185

Show HN: A Digital CD Shelf as the UI for Music Streaming Libraries
text:
I realized that (re-)discovering albums in my Spotify library is challenging, so I started thinking on what might be a good alternative UI for the digital music libraries.

CD shelves provide a great overview of an entire collection and I thought it might be cool to see a digital adaptation of them, so I coded a quick demo with mock data using v0.dev.

The UI is optimised for mobile and allows you to view many albums on a single screen and you can click on single albums to bring up a detail page.

I'm interested to hear your thoughts on whether this could be a better UI and how it could be improved.
